featured.text: Others say the patients may need to engage in sports outside of their usual, main sport (that is, to cross-train), at least some of the time.
Peter told Marie that he couldn't attend her birthday party because he had been engaged.
People in that remote village feed themselves by hunting and engaging in _____ forms of agriculture.

definition.zh_def: 參與；吸引（注意力或興趣）
definition.en_def: To participate or become involved in; to attract or hold the attention of.
definition.example: She decided to engage in community service to help those in need.
